traits.name: Gifted Performer
traits.description: Describe how you perform for others. You can play each song once per long rest:

options.description: You and all allies within Close range clear a Hit Point.
Make a target within Close range temporarily Vulnerable.
You and all allies within Close range gain a Hope.

traits.name: Maestro
traits.description: Your rallying songs steel the courage of those who listen. When you give a Rally Die to an ally, they can gain a Hope or clear a Stress.

traits.name: Virtuoso
traits.description: You are among the greatest of your craft and your skill is boundless. You can perform each of your 'Gifted Performer' feature's songs twice instead of once per long rest.

traits.name: Rousing Speech
traits.description: Once per long rest, you can give a heartfelt, inspiring speech. All allies within Far range clear 2 Stress.

traits.name: Heart of a Poet
traits.description: After you make an action roll to impress, persuade, or offend someone, you can **spend a Hope** to add a **d4** to the roll.

traits.name: Eloquent
traits.description: Your moving words boost morale. Once per session, when you encourage an ally, you can do one of the following:

options.description: Allow them to find a mundane object or tool they need.
Help an Ally without spending Hope
Give them an additional downtime move during their next rest.

traits.name: Epic Poetry
traits.description: Your Rally Die increases to a **d10**. Additionally, when you Help an Ally, you can narrate the moment as if you were writing the tale of their heroism in a memoir. When you do, roll a **d10** as your advantage die.
